summary: TAKATA RECALL- THE RADIO SCREEN GOES COMPLETELY BLACK WHEN IT COMES BACK ON ITS UN- READABLE. ALSO WHENEVER YOU TURN THE AC ON IT MAKES A CLICKING SOUND. BOTH HAPPEN WHILE DRIVING(  IN MOTION, STATIONARY, CITY STREETS AS WELL AS HIGHWAY... ALSO, THE  BACK WINDOWS CLICK WHEN ROLLING THEM UP OR DOWN.
